class.name: CapsuleMesh
class.description: Class representing a capsule-shaped [PrimitiveMesh]. [b]Note:[/b] The [member radius] of a [CapsuleMesh] cannot exceed half of its [member height]; otherwise, the capsule becomes a circle. If the [member radius] exceeds half of the [member height], the properties adjust to a valid value.

members.member: Total height of the capsule mesh (including the hemispherical ends).
Number of radial segments on the capsule mesh.
Number of rings along the height of the capsule.
